intro.html:
Dear people,

I am Thomas. I love creating experiences that touch people by fusing the analog and the digital world. I believe in free software and enjoy collaborating with others. Aside from working as a senior creative technologist at IXDS, I am freelancing. Music plays an important role in my life, which is reflected in some of my side projects as well. I write my own performance software and tools, to make my life and the life of others easier and more fun.

software.html:
Some of my open source contributions can be found on my github page.

  • ofPackageManager: package manager for openFrameworks
  • ofPackageManager-frontend: its electron, react based frontend
  • ofOSCDebugger, ofMIDIDebugger: osc and midi debugging tools
  • ofMIDI2MQTT, ofOSC2MIDI, ...: small cli utilities to convert between different protocols
  • ofxLiveSet, ofxNDI, ...: openFrameworks addons
  • QMIDI, QOSC, QFirmata, ...: Qt libraries
  • gitable: small cli utility to enable git usage for ableton live projects

footer.html:
This website is written with gatsby.js, the source can be found here. It does not use any cookies.

Please don't hesitate to get in touch via email (thomas.geissl@gmail.com) if you want to collaborate or have any questions. Or connect with me on social media. Some of my digital photographs can be found here, for the analog ones you will have to swing by at my place. Also, I do have a linkedin account, in case someone wants to connect there.

Bussi und baba
Thomas
